articles.author: kolob1980
articles.title: Show HN: Emojilang = Emoji and Language Learning
articles.description:
Learn foreign words easily and fun with the Emojilang app. We removed the boring stuff and created an incredibly memorable way to learn words. For learning, we use a fun language quiz with familiar emoji.

Learn Easy and Fun:
- English
- Spanish
- French
- Ge…
